QuestData.Title: Energy Cells for Everyone
QuestData.Description:
The wondrous scuttlebutt around town is that the charging station in Bondo's Yard is going to be repaired today!
That charging station is the best way to recharge all the Empty Energy Cells that've been piling up in your bag. Or in other people's bag. Or inside the mechanical innards of robots you don't own but are legally allowed to destroy.
After you've acquired Empty Energy Cells, help build the charging station in Bondo's Yard and charge all of your Empty Energy Cells!
QuestData.LogDescription:
Find $2oa Empty Energy Cells in Mechagon.
Then, help build the Charging Station construction project and use it to charge your Empty Energy Cells.

Objectives.Objective: Empty Energy Cells charged at Charging Station
